_sText:
Map developed by Moreno.

How to install:
Replace cstrike in this rar in your Counter Strike: Source folder.

=====>Demostration video: <==========================
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yi5cHrfjSKg

Notes:
This map requires 2 or 3 players minimun in Terrorist team for the control of the entire map. 
The map have some proofs for CT like in Takeshi´s Castle tv show, the Terrorists must "smash" CT to avoid
their death. If some CT reach the Terrorist´s castle, they can take a weapon and get revenge.

Proofs description:
1- The CT must pass a high wall in some seconds or he will die. TIP: Up "leaned" and crouch at the higher point.
2- In this proof Terrorist can throw big rocks to crush CTs.
3- The maze, only one exit, many water ends, one Terrorist with a knife inside. Its important that the Terrorist
   dont go outside the maze (abuse and less fun :( ).
4- The players mount in big cups and slide down to pass the deathly lake.
5- One Terrorist control a cannon and shoot balls everyone CT that try to pass the bridge.
6- In this proof, Terrorists must active one combination of "false" rocks that push CTs to the deathly lake.
7- Last proof, to reach the other shore CT must mount the surfboard and avoid the obstacles.
8- If you reach this point, go inside, take a shotgun and kill some Terrorists.
